main event: Observer noted a star-like object traveling from West to East with a southerly drift, visible for about 6 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as having a star or satellite appearance., The observation was conducted ground-visual at night., The object was reported to have a zig-zag path at first sighting., There was no sound or exhaust noted from the object., The object faded out of sight after being visible for approximately 8 minutes.
